price: Tolaafi ni’imaa Rabbi irraa ta’een (kana godhe). Rabbiin beekaa, ogeessa.
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعۡمَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: faḍlan mina al-lahi waniʿ'matan wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
